Home » 16A5 Pañcakanipātapāḷi » 5 Pañcamapaṇṇāsaka » 5.3 Dīghacārikavagga
5.3.9 Paṭhamakaṇhasappasutta
Pañcamapaṇṇāsaka
Dīghacārikavagga
Paṭhamakaṇhasappasutta
229.
1280“Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā kaṇhasappe. Katame pañca? Asuci, duggandho, sabhīru, sappaṭibhayo, mittadubbhī. Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā kaṇhasappe.
1281Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcime ādīnavā mātugāme. Katame pañca? Asuci, duggandho, sabhīru, sappaṭibhayo, mittadubbhī. Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā mātugāme”ti.
1282Navamaṃ.
